name: SSDD
description:
This is a tumblr theme I whipped up. Artwork is not by me. I can work on finding the original artist but for now it's unknown.
Artist is still unknown but here is a post of the artwork from a year ago: http://fuckyeahssdd.tumblr.com/post/20385736859
Characters are not owned by me either they are from homestuck.
Draconian Dignitary and Sovereign Slayer/Jack Noir, dressed up as Bec Noir.
SSDD
